document.full_text: a judge on friday skipped a preliminary hearing and ordered an immediate trial for a catholic monsignor, two priests and others named in the sexual abuse scandal rocking the archdiocese of philadelphia.
document.title: judge orders quick trial in philadelphia church sex case
lines_and_colors: a judge on friday skipped a preliminary hearing and ordered an immediate trial for a catholic monsignor, two priests and others named in the sexual abuse scandal rocking the archdiocese of philadelphia.
